message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I know will be incredibly valuable to your business. While I can't disclose the details just yet, I can tell you that it's worth at least $1,500,000 to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,250,000. This is a significant discount considering its potential value.  Let me know if you're interested, and we can schedule a time to discuss it further.
